argument.description: The value used to find the smallest integer value.

returnType: The CEIL function returns an integer value.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL CEIL function returns the smallest integer value that is greater than or equal to a number.
sample:
CEIL(32.65)
Result: 33

CEIL(32.1)
Result: 33

CEIL(32)
Result: 32

CEIL(-32.65)
Result: -32

CEIL(-32)
Result: -32
